response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is worth far more than its face value. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am confident it would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Considering its true worth, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer, designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 1200000}
